query.sql: select u.CD_USU, u.NM_USU, u.NM_ABVD, p.NR_TCEL, concat(u.CD_USU, ' ', u.NM_USU) as chaveNome, u.CD_CMSS, u.CD_IOR, d.CD_PILAR, p.TX_CMSS_FUN, p.NR_CPF, p.CD_EMAI_BB, p.CD_CLI, d.CD_PRF, ( select CD_PRF from mstNovo.depe where CD_UOR = mstNovo.diretoria(u.CD_UOR_LCLZ) ) as prfDiretoria, e.SG_UF, p.CD_TEL_TRB, d.CD_TIP_UOR, u.CD_UOR_LCLZ, u.CD_UOR_EQP from arhNovo.tb_usu as u left join arh.dado_pss as p on p.CD_USU = u.CD_USU inner join mstNovo.depe as d on d.CD_UOR = u.CD_UOR_LCLZ left join mstNovo.depe_end as e on e.CD_UOR = d.CD_UOR where u.CD_USU = ? limit 1;
